### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Electricity generator at position(x=10.5, y=10.5)
Consists of steam engine(position x=10.5, y=10.5), boiler(position x=-6.0, y=24.5), and offshore pump(position x=-9.5, y=24.5)

### Iron ore mine at position(x=43.0, y=-84.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position x=43.0, y=-84.0) and a furnace at position(x=45.0, y=-83.0)
-  Furnace at position(x=40.0, y=-82.0)
-  Furnace at position(x=42.0, y=-81.0)
-  Furnace at position(x=45.0, y=-80.0)
-  Furnace at position(x=40.0, y=-79.0)

### Iron ore mine at position(x=-15.0, y=-50.0)
Consists of burner mining drill (position x=-15.0, y=-50.0)

### Lab at position(x=0.5, y=0.5)
Consists of lab(position x=0.5, y=0.5) and burner inserter(position x=3.5, y=0.5)

### Chests
Consists of multiple chests at different positions, including (x=43.5, y=-82.5), (x=40.5, y=-80.5), (x=43.5, y=-81.5), (x=2.5, y=0.5), (x=0.5, y=2.5)

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when setting research
-  Ensure the correct syntax and arguments are used when setting research, as incorrect usage can result in exceptions.
### Errors when inserting items
-  Make sure the item to be inserted is available in the inventory before attempting to insert it, as attempting to insert an item that is not available can result in exceptions.
### Errors when setting entity recipes
-  Ensure that the entity is capable of having its recipe or filter set before attempting to do so, as attempting to set a recipe or filter on an entity that is not capable can result in exceptions.
### Errors when using burner inserter
-  Ensure the chest is not full before attempting to insert items into it, as attempting to insert items into a full chest can result in warnings.
